text: Aja is an Orisha, the spirit of the forest, the animals within it and herbal healers. She is a patron of the forest and all the animals within it. She holds the secrets of botany, and is a master of potions and healing herbs. She passed this skill to the Yoruban people, who practice her craft to this very day. Category:Yoruba goddesses Category:Nature goddesses Category:Health goddesses
title: Aja (orisha)
